div.p: The egg date data will be available from the NERC Environmental Information Data Centre as: Hinsley SA (2016) First egg dates for Great Tits and Blue Tits breeding in three deciduous woods in Cambridgeshire, England in 1993 to 2015. NERC-Environmental Information Data Centre: https://catalogue.ceh.ac.uk/documents/2efa9bf4-e5c0-42f9-8fcb-90dca2bb9c66. Climate data are available as referenced in the paper.
